item.description:
You are invited to join the JP Cohousing community for a barbecue. We will serve grilled hamburgers and either portobello mushrooms and/or veggie burgers (depends what we can find at the store). We will also have salad and corn on the cob followed by fruit and ice cream. Please let us know whether you are a vegetarian or a carnivore.

We look forward to getting to know you. Afterwards, we will give you a tour of our Common House which includes the kid's room, living room, Great Room, kitchen, mailroom, offices, rumpus room, laundry, and guest suite.

Please come directly to the Common House which is the big building you see across the interior yard when you first come in the Cornwall Street entrance. We will be on the patio to welcome you.

NOTE: We will eat indoors if it rains.
item.how_to_find_us: Come to the Common House and ask for Diane or Jeney
item.name: Barbecue at JP Cohousing
